conversations.body_text: Hi Kevin Harris,  ​  First, I'd like to apologize.  Your order was split into three packages for shipment. One package has already been delivered, while the other two have not yet been shipped. Details are as follows:  1. The Pro X pedals are currently sold out at our US warehouse. We have urgently arranged air freight and expect shipment on the 22nd, with an estimated delivery date around the 25th.  2. The motors were out of stock for two weeks due to a product upgrade. The upgrade is now complete, and we will arrange shipment for you within the next few days.     We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Should you have any questions, we will prioritize addressing them for you.

Thank you so much for the update ?

I have 3 friends that want to buy but are waiting to see how I like them.
Can't wait hope they are great to spread your products.

Have a great day
Kevin Harris


________________________________
